titles.title: CB 68 Blessing and Honor and Glory Be Thine

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
BLESSING AND HONOR AND GLORY BE
THINE,
And glory be Thine, and glory be Thine. Blessing
and honor and glory be Thine, for Thou art on the
throne.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Praise Him, praise Him, all ye saints adore Him.
Praise Him, praise Him, for He is on the throne.
Hallelujah!
(Repeat first verse)
